fulltext:
1 | 3 
  PROFILE 
Name: Nguyen Thanh Than.  
Address: Truong Tho ward, Thu Duc district. Skype: nt.than  
Positions available for: Senior Front-end Engineer. 
Specialties: (ReactJS/React Native, AngularJS/Angular 2++/Ionic 1++, Redux, NGRX(ngrx-store/ 
ngrx-effects), TypeScript, HTML5, SMACSS SASS, CSS3, Responsive UI, Vanilla JS, Node, 
Bootstrap, Photoshop, Sketch, MVC, Git, Jira, Agile). 
2 | 3 
Skill Summary(8+ of experience on front-end developer). 
• 
Designed and implemented React + Redux/ AngularJS/Angular 2++ NGRX-store, NGRX-effects web 
application, React Native/ Ionic 1++ IOS, Android app. 
• 
Experienced in using TypeScript, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX. 
• 
Converted design file by Photoshop/Sketch to layout web/mobile app using HTML5/CSS3/Vanilla JS/jQuery, 
Bootstrap, SMACSS SASS, Telerik Kendo UI. 
• 
Experienced in Responsive UI. 
• 
Experienced in using version control systems such as Git, SVN 
• 
Experienced in Magento, Word press, EZ publish CMS. 
• 
Jira, Git, SVN. 
• 
ASP.NET MVC. 
• 
SQL Server 2000, 2005, 2008 
• 
Agile principles. 
 Experience. 
Great Eastern - Singapore(Onsite). 
1/2019-Present 
• 
Implemented web application, mobile app for insurance. 
• 
Responsive for web app. 
• 
Build and deployed app. 
• 
Improved performance for web application and mobile app. 
Tools: Angular, NGRX, Ionic, TypeScript, Vanilla JS, Bootstrap, HTML 5/CSS3, high chart, moment, Photoshop, 
Sketch, XCode, Android studio, git, Jira. 
Miller Gold Technology Solutions - Australia, Vietnam. 
10/2013-12/2018 
Font-end developer(Team leader). 
• 
Implemented web application, mobile app for fintech, health, insurance, recruitment. 
• 
Break down tasks, estimate, assign tasks to member. 
• 
Hosted planning, demo to client. 
• 
Reviewed code and merged pull request to SIT, UAT, Production branch. 
• 
Built app for release. 
• 
Improved performance for web application and mobile app. 
• 
Wrote some prototype method for string, array, object. 
3 | 3 
Tools: React, React Native, Redux, Angular, NGRX, Ionic, TypeScript, Vanilla JS, Graph QL, Bootstrap, HTML 
5/CSS3, high chart, moment, Photoshop, Sketch, XCode, Android studio, git, Jira. 
Audience media co., Ltd – Australia, Vietnam. 
4/20012-10/2013 
Front end developer. 
• 
I am proficient with HTML5/CSS3 that uses Adobe Dreamweaver, PHP Storm and validation HTML5/CSS3 
using W3C. 
• 
I have programmed HTML5/CSS3 for most websites for January Company including restaurants, schools, law 
offices, coffee bars. Moreover, I am also skilled at JavaScript, ajax, PHP and MySQL. 
• 
I supported the back end team in the completion of websites and responsive UI to the website work on 
mobile and tablet. 
• 
I have been using SVN, git so managed the code. 
Tools: EZ publish, Word press CMS, HTML5, CSS3/SASS, (Twitter) Bootstrap, jQuery. 
SITTI Vietnam co., Ltd – France, Vietnam 
5/2009-3/2012 
Website developer 
• 
Develop module website with PHP, HTML 4, CSS 2, AJAX. 
• 
Convert PSD to HTML. 
• 
Design banner, layout of website with Photoshop, Flash, Dream weaver… 
• 
Do testing for website. 
Tools: CodeIgniter framework, MySQL, jQuery, Vanilla Javascript. 
Education 
University of Natural Sciences of Ho Chi Minh City 
Diploma’s Degree in Computer Sciences 
08/2007 
University of Transport of Ho Chi Minh City 
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Sciences 
10/2011
